entry.title: Tahoe Tack Silver Texas Star Show Spotted Leather Western Ladies Spur Straps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Western Spurs & Straps
Price: 21.95

Tahoe Tack’s Silver Texas Star Show Spotted Leather Western Ladies Spur Straps is an attractive new Medium Oil leather pair of ladies spur straps that are a part of the Texas Star series. These new leather spur straps feature flashy engraved 1” Texas Star conchos placed in the center of each of the spur straps, as well as attractive stainless steel show spots covering the spur straps. These spur straps were designed for women and will fit most boot sizes. Our spur straps are adjustable from 8.5” to 10” long, and are 2.5” wide at the widest point, tapering down to ⅝”. Tahoe Tack’s Silver Texas Star collection also includes matching tack pieces such as a browband headstall, slip ear headstall, noseband, split reins, and breast collar. 


  • PART OF THE TEXAS STAR COLLECTION - this pair of spur straps is part of Tahoe Tack’s new Texas Star collection, which is composed of matching Medium Oil leather tack pieces featuring Texas Star conchos and stainless steel show spots.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST WOMEN - our ladies spur straps are “one size fits all” and are designed to fit most boots. Our spur straps are adjustable from 8.5” to 10” long, and are 2.5” wide at the widest point, tapering down to ⅝”. 
  • SPOTTED TEXAS STAR DESIGN - these new leather spur straps feature flashy engraved 1” Texas Star conchos placed in the center of each of the spur straps, as well as attractive stainless steel show spots covering the spur straps. 
  • FITS ALL SPURS - our universal ladies spur straps are designed to fit all western spurs.
  • ONE YEAR WARRANTY - this product comes with a one-year limited manufacturer’s warranty that protects against quality issues and defects. To register your product, visit the manufacturer Derby Originals' website.

Measurements:

End to End: 8.5” - 10”

Width: Tapers from 2.5” to ⅝”

entry.title: Troxel Sierra Western Helmets
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Helmets
Price: 114.95

Engineered to withstand the toughest terrain, the Sierra’s nylon and leather covering looks good while protecting the shell from scratches. The comfortable, self-adjusting SureFit™ Pro system and Air-Channel ™ headliner perform flawlessly to provide all day comfort on the trail or in the arena.

Key features include:

  • Low profile
  • Rugged leather & nylon covering
  • Mesh-covered vents
  • SureFit™ Pro fit system
  • FlipFold™ removable washable headliner with Air-Channel™ technology
  • ASTM/SEI-certified

entry.title: Troxel Liberty Series Low Profile Riding Helmet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Helmets
Price: 59.95

Ultralight, low profile helmet with large vents providing superior ventilation for a cooler, more comfortable ride. With a DialFit™ comfort system and removable and washable headliner with FlipFold shims for personal fit options, the Liberty is a great option for all types of riding disciplines.

Key features include:

  • Low profile
  • Durable, lightweight construction
  • Six mesh covered vents
  • DialFit™ system
  • NEW XS size
  • FlipFold™ removable washable headliner with Air-Channel™ technology
  • ASTM/SEI-certified

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Patriotic American Flag Leather Western Spur Straps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Western Spurs & Straps
Price: 29.95

Tahoe Tack’s “Jewel of the West” collection was designed to dazzle in the show ring and is composed of only the most beautiful tack items which are adorned with hand-tooled accents, conchos, show spots, crystals, and many other elegant features. These western pieces exemplify the beauty of fine western tack and are meant to highlight your horse’s features and allow you to stand out in the show ring.

  • QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - these western spur straps were designed by Tahoe Tack, a fine maker of quality western tack for over 20 years. They feature durable hardware and high-quality leather that is designed to last many years with proper care.

  • PATRIOTIC DESIGN - features sunspots and a hand-painted American flag inspired design in bold red, white, and blue and is perfect for shows or parades.
  • MULTIPLE SIZES AVAILABLE - these spur straps are available in both Ladies and Mens size to accommodate any adult rider.
  • VERSATILE DESIGN - these are versatile and eye catching. You can use them in a variety of western events like pleasure, pattern classes, trail riding, rodeos, and parades! 
  • MATCHING SET PIECES - Tahoe Tack also offers a matching western headstall, reins, and breast collar that are sold separately. If you already have the matching set pieces, complete your look with these spur straps!
entry.s:tag: red white and blue spur straps

Vendor: Tack Wholesale

The pioneer in lightweight, all-purpose, vented riding helmets, the Sport remains one of the most trusted helmets on the market. With a large size range and a very well ventilated lightweight design, the Sport remains a very popular all-purpose style option for the price conscious rider.

Key features include:

  • Durable, lightweight construction
  • Seven vents
  • Attached visor
  • Removable, washable headliner
  • ASTM/SEI-certified
